name: Metal Connection (A devel guy)
description:
Metal Connection is a game developed for Ryan Laley Games Spring Jam, inspired by Metal Gear from MSX.

How to play:

In this game, you will have to infiltrate to the enemy base in order to connect all of their terminals to your network. However, you will need to take into account the wiring of this network.

Hold down the E key when near a terminal to connect (this will also create a checkpoint).

If you want, hold down the E key again to reset your network (this will also create a checkpoint).

If your wiring runs out, you can hold down the R key to return to your previous position, or you can return to a terminal to reset your connection.

  • Press C to crouch.
  • Hold down R to Rewind
  • Hold down E to Interact
  • Press Esc to pause.
  • Move with ASDW and Mouse.

TIPS:

  • Keep an eye on the minimap to see the enemies' line of sight.
  • The enemy can see your head, try to be crouched
  • In the pause menu, you'll find some help

I used assets from the unity store and https://freesound.org/
I hope you like and have fun.
